name: mern-e-commerce
description:
Milk Records - A MERN e-commerce site

Visit the deployed site here

This is an online record store built using full MERN stack. It features separate user and admin functionalities (admins can perform CRUD functions as well as award other user admin status), and features multiple integrated payment methods. Users can search products, add items to cart while continuing to shop, and filter records by genre.


All design and artwork - including album art - was created by myself for this project.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend &&npm run build --prefix frontend
